title: 2008 Italian Grand Prix
summary: The 2008 Italian Grand Prix (formally the Formula 1 Gran Premio Santander D'Italia 2008)[1] was a Formula One motor race held on 14 September 2008 at the Autodromo Nazionale di Monza, Monza, Italy. It was the 14thÂ race of the 2008 Formula One World Championship. Sebastian Vettel for the Toro Rosso team won the 53-lap race from pole position. Heikki Kovalainen finished second in a McLaren, and Robert Kubica third in a BMW Sauber.
